messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] "Ah-neld"
messages.messageBody:
From: <CelticFrau@...>

<<Saw an interview with him years ago, he seemed very in love with
her,...interviewer said something jokingly about him being so macho and he
said laughingly
that he does whatever Maria says, she's the boss. But it was said in a way
like, he trusts and listens to her cause she knows what she's talking
about.>>



I always liked the way he talked about her. Just bring up her name and he
goes on about what a great wife and mother she is. How he trusts her totally
with the children and how wonderful she is in her mothering. I love when
guys publicly do that with their wives. I should also say that I also like
when women talk about their husbands like that too. Way too much spouse
bashing going on these days.

Mary B

messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] "Ah-neld"
messages.msgSnippet: In a message dated 6/1/2003 8:17:05 AM Eastern Standard Time, ... Saw an interview with him years ago, he seemed very in love with her,...interviewer said
messages.messageBody:
In a message dated 6/1/2003 8:17:05 AM Eastern Standard Time,
treegoddess@... writes:


> >That is so true...what does Maria see in him?
> >
>
> Maybe he's a good man, husband, and father. Maybe he's kind, sweet, and
> funny. What do most people "see" in the one they love?

Saw an interview with him years ago, he seemed very in love with
her,...interviewer said something jokingly about him being so macho and he said laughingly
that he does whatever Maria says, she's the boss. But it was said in a way
like, he trusts and listens to her cause she knows what she's talking about.
:o)

Nancy


[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]

messages.subject: "Ah-neld"
messages.msgSnippet: ... Maybe he s a good man, husband, and father.  Maybe he s kind, sweet, and funny.  What do most people see in the one they love? TreeGoddess
messages.messageBody:
coyote's corner wrote:

>That is so true...what does Maria see in him?
>

Maybe he's a good man, husband, and father. Maybe he's kind, sweet, and
funny. What do most people "see" in the one they love?

TreeGoddess
